title.focusOnWhatMatters: We help you focus on what matters.

main.description: Transform your learning journey with powerful study tools and productivity tracking. Your path to academic excellence begins here.

studyAnalysis.description: Track your progress with detailed analyses and insights into your study patterns.

library.description: Access a vast collection of books and study materials at your fingertips.

pdfSummaries.description: Get quick summaries of your PDF documents to save time and enhance comprehension.

pricing.title: Choose Your Study Plan
pricing.description: Select the plan that best fits your study needs and goals

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)
faq.description: Questions that can help you better understand our platform.

question_1.title: What is MindStudent?
question_1.answer: MindStudent is a learning platform that offers powerful tools to enhance your studies and track your productivity. Our goal is to help you focus on what matters and maximize your academic growth.

question_2.title: What are the main features of MindStudent?
question_2.answer: MindStudent offers various features, including: Study Analysis, Digital Library, Smart Flashcards, File Uploads, PDF Summaries, Smart Calendar, Multitasking Timer, and Progress Tracking.

question_3.title: How can MindStudent help me study more productively?
question_3.answer: MindStudent provides tools to help you organize your time, study materials, and track your progress. With features like study analysis, smart flashcards, and a multitasking timer, you can optimize your study sessions and improve information retention.

question_4.title: Is MindStudent free?
question_4.answer: MindStudent offers a free option to get started. You can begin your journey and experience the platform's basic features at no cost.

question_5.title: How can I start using MindStudent?
question_5.answer: To start using MindStudent, simply click the 'Start for Free' button on our homepage. You will be guided through the account creation process and can begin exploring the available tools.

question_6.title: Is MindStudent available in languages other than Portuguese?
question_6.answer: Yes, MindStudent is available in multiple languages, including Portuguese, English, and Spanish.

question_7.title: How does MindStudent protect my privacy and data?
question_7.answer: We take your privacy seriously. You can find detailed information about how we protect your data in our Privacy Policy, accessible via the link in the footer of our website.

question_8.title: How can I contact you for more information or support?
question_8.answer: For more information or support, you can follow us on our social media channels (LinkedIn and GitHub) or reach out through the support channels listed on our website.

cta.title: Ready to Test and Change Your Study Habits?
cta.description: Discover how to improve your learning style and achieve new academic results.
